00098 {
00100     CSL_UHPI_INST_0 = (0u),
00102     CSL_UHPI_INST_INVALID = (1u)
00103 } CSL_UhpiInsId;

00108 typedef enum CSL_UhpiOpmode {
00110     CSL_UHPI_8BIT_MUXED_DUAL_HALFWORD_CYCLES = 0,
00112     CSL_UHPI_16BIT_MUXED_SINGLE_FULLWORD_CYCLES,
00114     CSL_UHPI_16BIT_MUXED_DUAL_HALFWORD_CYCLES,
00116     CSL_UHPI_16BIT_NONMUXED,
00118     CSL_UHPI_32BIT_NONMUXED,

00122     CSL_UHPI_INVALID_OPMODE
00123 } CSL_UhpiOpmode;
